owl, hooting the leaves, rustling The


see. to all for spectacle A

see. to all for spectacle A

delight, soft a with Twinkle
bright, diamonds like above, Stars


day. fading the of songs Singing
play, gently does wind whispering A
moonlight, pale the Underneath
